item.text: I like restaurants, museums, cinema, home improvement.
I love to travel and I have a real passion for Asia.
I have played many sports: badminton, tennis, soccer, swimming, judo, jujitsu, archery, golf, ski, dancing.

Chairman of Grenoble Association Modelisation Mathematiques Appliquees in 2005 and 2006:
arrangement of leisure activities for the students of the school. I took part in associations from 2006 to 2008 dedicated to students rights protection.
